data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Stern, Stephen R. (2014): A new species of spiny Solanum (Solanaceae) from Peru. PhytoKeys 39: 27-34, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.39.7513, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.39.7513
